summary: Feature-length, live-action musical version of the classic fairy tale by Charles Perrault.
cast: Tahnee Welch|Kenny Baker|Morgan Fairchild|David Holliday|Nicholas Clay|Sylvia Miles|Shaike Ophir|Jane Wiedlin|Orna Porat|Julian Chagrin|Ya'ackov Ben-Sira|Danny Segev|Igor Borisov|Joseph Bee|Jonny Phillips|Yehuda Efroni|Michael Schneider|Bob Levit|Susan Berlin|Bettine Le Beau|Shone Anstey|Rolanda Chagrin|Shula Revach|Yael Uziely|Marjolein Rooduyn|Daniela Slavik|Esty Tsadok|Sharon Eyal|Amit Avigdor|Liora Grossman|Bruria Brackman
title: La bella durmiente
